    } else {

    }
  }
});

const TOKEN_KEY = "oj_user_token"; // é—¨ç¦å¡çš„ç¼–å·

// è¿›é—¨æ—¶åˆ·å¡ï¼ˆè·å–tokenï¼‰
export function getToken() {
  return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);
}

// åŠæ–°å¡ï¼ˆè®¾ç½®tokenï¼‰
export function setToken(token) {
  localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY, token);
}

// å¡ä¸¢äº†/æ¯•ä¸šäº†ï¼ˆç§»é™¤tokenï¼‰
export function removeToken() {
  localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);

export function isAuthenticated() {

}

// è¡¨å•æ•°æ®

const handleLogin = async () => {

class MockStorage {
  constructor() {
    this.storageKey = "oj_mock_data";
    this.initData();
  }

  initData() {
    if (!localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey)) {
      const initialData = {
        problems: [
          {
            id: 1,
            title: "ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ",
            label: "æ•°ç»„,å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨,ç®€å•",
            testPointNum: 3,
            description:
              "ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ nums å’Œä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡å€¼ targetï¼Œè¯·ä½ åœ¨è¯¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ‰¾å‡ºå’Œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å€¼çš„é‚£ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›å®ƒä»¬çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ã€‚\n\nä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾æ¯ç§è¾“å…¥åªä¼šå¯¹åº”ä¸€ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæ•°ç»„ä¸­åŒä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤éã€‚",
            testPointList: [
              { input: "3\n2 7 11 15\n9", output: "0 1", isSample: 1 },
              { input: "2\n3 2 4\n6", output: "1 2", isSample: 0 },
              { input: "2\n3 3\n6", output: "0 1", isSample: 0 },
            ],
            createTime: "2024-01-15 10:00:00",
          },
          {
            id: 2,
            title: "éªŒè¯å›æ–‡ä¸²",
            label: "å­—ç¬¦ä¸²,åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ,ç®€å•",
            testPointNum: 6,
            description:
              "ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å®ƒæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å›æ–‡ä¸²ï¼Œåªè€ƒè™‘å­—æ¯å’Œæ•°å­—å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¿½ç•¥å­—æ¯çš„å¤§å°å†™ã€‚\n\nè¯´æ˜ï¼šæœ¬é¢˜ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†ç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å®šä¹‰ä¸ºæœ‰æ•ˆçš„å›æ–‡ä¸²ã€‚",
            testPointList: [
              {
                input: '"A man, a plan, a canal: Panama"',
                output: "true",
                isSample: 1,
              },
              { input: '"race a car"', output: "false", isSample: 1 },
              { input: '""', output: "true", isSample: 0 },
            ],
            createTime: "2024-01-16 14:30:00",
          },
        ],
        nextProblemId: 3,
      };
      this.saveData(initialData);
    }
  }

  getData() {
    return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey)) || {};
  }

  saveData(data) {
    localStorage.setItem(this.storageKey, JSON.stringify(data));
  }

  // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰é¢˜ç›®
  getProblems() {
    return this.getData().problems || [];
  }

  // æ·»åŠ é¢˜ç›®
  addProblem(problem) {
    const data = this.getData();
    const newProblem = {
      ...problem,
      id: data.nextProblemId++,
      createTime: new Date().toLocaleString("zh-CN"),
    };
    data.problems.push(newProblem);
    this.saveData(data);
    return newProblem;
  }

  // æ›´æ–°é¢˜ç›®
  updateProblem(updatedProblem) {
    const data = this.getData();
    const index = data.problems.findIndex((p) => p.id === updatedProblem.id);
    if (index !== -1) {
      data.problems[index] = {
        ...data.problems[index],
        ...updatedProblem,
        // ä¿ç•™åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´
        createTime: data.problems[index].createTime,
      };
      this.saveData(data);
      return data.problems[index];
    }
    return null;
  }

  // åˆ é™¤é¢˜ç›®
  deleteProblem(id) {
    const data = this.getData();
    data.problems = data.problems.filter((p) => p.id !== id);
    this.saveData(data);
    return true;
  }

  // åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
  getProblemsByPage(pageNum = 1, size = 10) {
    const problems = this.getProblems();
    const start = (pageNum - 1) * size;
    const end = start + size;
    const pageData = problems.slice(start, end);

    return {
      records: pageData,
      total: problems.length,
      pageNum,
      size,
    };
  }

  // æ ¹æ®IDæŸ¥è¯¢
  getProblemById(id) {
    const problems = this.getProblems();
    return problems.find((p) => p.id === Number(id));
  }
}

// åˆ›å»ºå•ä¾‹å®ä¾‹
export const mockStorage = new MockStorage();

import request from "@/utils/request";
import { mockStorage } from "@/utils/mockData";

// æ˜¯å¦ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
const USE_MOCK = true;

// æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå»¶è¿Ÿ
const mockDelay = (ms = 500) =>
  new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, ms));

// é¢˜ç›®ç®¡ç†æ¥å£
export const problemAdminAPI = {
  // æ·»åŠ é¢˜ç›®
  addProblem: async (data) => {
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      await mockDelay();
      const result = mockStorage.addProblem(data);
      return { data: result, code: 200, message: "æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸ" };
    }

    return request({
      url: "/testQuestion/addTestQuestion",
      method: "POST",
      data,
    });
  },

  // åˆ é™¤é¢˜ç›®
  deleteProblem: async (id) => {
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      await mockDelay();
      const success = mockStorage.deleteProblem(id);
      return {
        data: null,
        code: success ? 200 : 400,
        message: success ? "åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ" : "åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥",
      };
    }

    return request({
      url: "/testQuestion/deleteTestQuestionById",
      method: "DELETE",
      data: { id },
    });
  },

  // æ›´æ–°é¢˜ç›®
  updateProblem: async (data) => {
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      await mockDelay();
      const result = mockStorage.updateProblem(data);
      if (result) {
        return { data: result, code: 200, message: "æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ" };
      } else {
        return { data: null, code: 400, message: "é¢˜ç›®ä¸å­˜åœ¨" };
      }
    }

    return request({
      url: "/testQuestion/updateTestQuestion",
      method: "POST",
      data,
    });
  },

  // é¢˜ç›®åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
  getProblemsByPage: async (params) => {
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      await mockDelay(300);
      const { pageNum = 1, size = 10, keyword } = params;

      let problems = mockStorage.getProblems();

      // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½
      if (keyword) {
        problems = problems.filter(
          (p) =>
            p.title.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase()) ||
            p.label.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
        );
      }

      const start = (pageNum - 1) * size;
      const end = start + size;
      const pageData = problems.slice(start, end);

      return {
        data: {
          records: pageData,
          total: problems.length,
          pageNum,
          size,
        },
        code: 200,
        message: "æŸ¥è¯¢æˆåŠŸ",
      };
    }

    return request({
      url: "/testQuestion/getTestQuestionByPage",
      method: "GET",
      params,
    });
  },

  // æ ¹æ®IDæŸ¥è¯¢é¢˜ç›®
  getProblemById: async (id) => {
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      await mockDelay();
      const problem = mockStorage.getProblemById(id);
      if (problem) {
        return { data: problem, code: 200, message: "æŸ¥è¯¢æˆåŠŸ" };
      } else {
        return { data: null, code: 404, message: "é¢˜ç›®ä¸å­˜åœ¨" };
      }
    }

    return request({
      url: "/testQuestion/getTestQuestionById",
      method: "GET",
      params: { id },
    });
  },
};

const fetchProblems = async () => {
  loading.value = true;

    const params = {
      pageNum: pagination.value.pageNum,
      size: pagination.value.size,
    };

    if (searchKeyword.value) {
      params.keyword = searchKeyword.value;

    const response = await problemAdminAPI.getProblemsByPage(params);

    // å¤„ç†æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®å’ŒçœŸå®æ•°æ®çš„å“åº”æ ¼å¼å·®å¼‚
    if (USE_MOCK) {
      problemList.value = response.data.records || [];
      pagination.value.total = response.data.total || 0;
    } else {
      problemList.value = response.data?.records || [];
      pagination.value.total = response.data?.total || 0;
    }
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage.error("è·å–é¢˜ç›®åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥");
    console.error("è·å–é¢˜ç›®åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:", error);
  } finally {
    loading.value = false;
  }
};

// åœ¨ handleDelete æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼š
const handleDelete = async (id) => {
  try {

      type: "warning",

    const response = await problemAdminAPI.deleteProblem(id);

    // æ£€æŸ¥å“åº”æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ

    } else {
      ElMessage.error(response.message || "åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥");

  } catch (error) {
    if (error !== "cancel") {
      ElMessage.error("åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥");
      console.error("åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥:", error);

  }
};

// æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤„ç†CORSçš„Expressä»£ç 
const express = require("express");
const app = express();

app.use(express.json());

// è‡ªå®šä¹‰è·¨åŸŸä¸­é—´ä»¶
app.use((req, res, next) => {
  // å…è®¸å‰ç«¯8081ç«¯å£è®¿é—®
  res.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "http://localhost:8081");
  // å…è®¸çš„è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆè¦†ç›–æ‰€æœ‰å¸¸ç”¨HTTPæ–¹æ³•ï¼‰
  res.setHeader(
    "Access-Control-Allow-Methods",
    "GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS"
  );
  // å…è®¸çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒJSONã€Tokenç­‰ï¼‰
  res.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Headers", "Content-Type, Authorization");

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> twoSum(std::vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int n = nums.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
                if (nums[i] + nums[j] == target) {
                    return {i, j};
                }
            }
        }
        return {};
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> twoSum(std::vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int n = nums.size();
        unordered_map<int,int>mp;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(mp.find(target-nums[i])!=mp.end()){
                return {i,mp[target-nums[i]]};
            }
            mp[nums[i]]=i;
        }
        return {};
    }
};

    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int removeDuplicates(vector<int>& nums) {
        int k=0;
        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){
            if(nums[i]!=nums[k]){
                k++;
                nums[k]=nums[i];
            }
        }
        return k+1;//ä»0å¼€å§‹è®¡æ•°
    }

class Solution {
public:
    int removeDuplicates(vector<int>& nums) {
        int n=nums.size();
        if(n<=2) return n;
        int j=0;
        int cnt=1;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
            if(nums[i]==nums[j]){
                if(cnt>=2) continue;
                cnt++;
                j++;
                nums[j]=nums[i];
            }
            else{
                cnt=1;
                j++;
                nums[j]=nums[i];
            }
        }
        return j+1;
    }
};

class RandomizedSet {
public:
    RandomizedSet() {
        srand(time(0));
    }
    int find(int val){
        for(int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++){
            if (a[i] == val){
                return i;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
    bool insert(int val) {
        int loc=find(val);
        if(loc==-1){
            a.push_back(val);
            return 1;
        }
        return 0;
    }
    
    bool remove(int val) {
        int loc=find(val);
        if(loc==-1) return 0;
        else{
            a.erase(a.begin()+loc);
            return 1;
        }
    }
    int getRandom() {
        if(a.size()==0) return 0;
        return a[rand()%a.size()];
    }
    public:
    vector<int>a;
};

class RandomizedSet {
public:
    unordered_map<int, int> mp; 
    vector<int> a; 
    RandomizedSet() {
        srand(time(0)); 
    }

    int find(int val) {
        if (mp.count(val)) { 
            return mp[val];
        }
        return -1;
    }

    bool insert(int val) {
        if (find(val) != -1) {
            return false;
        }
        a.push_back(val);
        mp[val] = a.size() - 1; //è¿™ä¸¤æ­¥å†™å®Œï¼Œæ‰ç®—å®Œæˆã€‚
        return true;
    }

    bool remove(int val) {
        int loc = find(val);
        if (loc == -1) {
            return false;
        }

        int last = a.back(); 
        a[loc] = last; 
        mp[last] = loc; 
        
        mp.erase(val);
        a.pop_back();
        return true;
    }

    int getRandom() {
        if (a.empty()) return 0;
        return a[rand() % a.size()];
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int trap(vector<int>& height) {
        int lmax=0,rmax=0;
        int l=0,r=height.size()-1;
        int n=height.size();
        int ans=0;
        while(l<r){
            lmax=max(lmax,height[l]);
            rmax=max(rmax,height[r]);
            if(lmax>rmax) {
                ans+=rmax-height[r];
                r--;
            }
            else{
                ans+=lmax-height[l];
                l++;
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

exports.addMerchant = async (req, res) => {
  //è·å–æ•°æ®
  const { name, address, phone } = req.body;
  try {
    const [result] = await pool.execute(
      `INSERT INTO merchants (name,address,phone) VALUES(?,?,?)`,

    );
    res.json({

      data: err.message,

exports.approveMerchant = async (req, res) => {
  const { id } = req.params;
  try {
    const [result] = await pool.execute(
      "UPDATE merchants SET status = 1 WHERE id = ?",
      [id]
    );
    if (result.affectedRows === 1) {
      res.json({
        code: 200,
        msg: "å•†å®¶å®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡ï¼",
      });
    } else {
      res.json({
        code: 404,
        msg: "å•†å®¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨",
      });
    }
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({
      code: 500,
      msg: "æœåŠ¡å™¨å‡ºé”™",
      error: err.message,
    });
  }
};

exports.getServices = async (req, res) => {
  const { category } = req.query;
  let sql = `
    SELECT s.*,m.name AS merchant_name
    FROM services AS s
    LEFT JOIN merchants AS m ON s.merchant_id = m.id
    where 1=1
    `;
  let params = [];
  // æ ¹æ®å‰ç«¯ä¼ é€’çš„åˆ†ç±»å‚æ•°ï¼ˆcategoryï¼‰
  // åŠ¨æ€ä¸º SQL æŸ¥è¯¢æ·»åŠ  â€œæœåŠ¡åˆ†ç±»â€ ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå®ç° â€œæŒ‰åˆ†ç±»ç­›é€‰æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨â€ çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å…¼é¡¾çµæ´»æ€§å’Œå®‰å…¨æ€§ã€‚
  if (category && category !== "all") {
    sql += ` AND s.category=?`;
    params.push(category);
  }
  try {
    const [row] = await pool.execute(sql, params);
    res.json({
      code: 200,
      message: "è·å–æˆåŠŸ",
      data: row,
    });
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({
      code: 500,
      message: "è·å–å¤±è´¥",
      error: err.message,
    });
  }
};

exports.addService = async (req, res) => {
  const { merchant_id, name, price, category, image_url, stock } = req.body;
  try {
    const [result] = await pool.execute(
      `INSERT INTO services (name,price,category, image_url,merchant_id,stock) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)`,
      [name, price, category, image_url, merchant_id, stock]
    );
    res.json({
      code: 200,
      message: "æ–°å¢æœåŠ¡æˆåŠŸ",
      data: { id: result.insertId },
    });
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({
      code: 500,
      message: "æ–°å¢æœåŠ¡å¤±è´¥",
      data: err.message,
    });
  }
};

// æœåŠ¡ä¸Šæ¶ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œä¸Šæ¶â€ï¼‰
exports.publishService = async (req, res) => {
  const { id } = req.params;
  try {
    const [result] = await pool.execute(
      "UPDATE services SET status = 1 WHERE id = ?",
      [id]
    );
    if (result.affectedRows === 1) {
      res.json({ code: 200, msg: "æœåŠ¡ä¸Šæ¶æˆåŠŸï¼" });
    } else {
      res.json({ code: 404, msg: "æœåŠ¡ä¸å­˜åœ¨" });
    }
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({ code: 500, msg: "æœåŠ¡å™¨å‡ºé”™", error: err.message });
  }
};

// æœåŠ¡ä¸‹æ¶ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œä¸‹æ¶â€ï¼‰
exports.unpublishService = async (req, res) => {
  const { id } = req.params;
  try {
    const [result] = await pool.execute(
      "UPDATE services SET status = 0 WHERE id = ?",
      [id]
    );
    if (result.affectedRows === 1) {
      res.json({ code: 200, msg: "æœåŠ¡ä¸‹æ¶æˆåŠŸï¼" });
    } else {
      res.json({ code: 404, msg: "æœåŠ¡ä¸å­˜åœ¨" });
    }
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({ code: 500, msg: "æœåŠ¡å™¨å‡ºé”™", error: err.message });
  }
};

// WHERE 1=1
// è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª â€œæŠ€å·§æ€§å†™æ³•â€ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿åç»­åŠ¨æ€æ·»åŠ æ¡ä»¶ã€‚
// æ¯”å¦‚åé¢æœ‰ if (status !== undefined) æ—¶ï¼Œ
// ä¼šæ‹¼æ¥ AND o.status = ?ã€‚å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ 1=1ï¼Œåˆå§‹çš„ WHERE å­å¥æ˜¯ç©ºçš„
// ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æ·»åŠ æ¡ä»¶æ—¶éœ€è¦å†™ WHERE o.status = ?ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡æ·»åŠ æ‰å†™ AND ...ï¼Œä»£ç é‡Œå°±è¦åˆ¤æ–­ â€œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶â€ï¼Œå¾ˆéº»çƒ¦ã€‚
// æœ‰äº† 1=1 åï¼Œä¸ç®¡åé¢åŠ å¤šå°‘æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç”¨ AND ... æ‹¼æ¥å°±è¡Œ
// ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ WHERE 1=1 AND o.status=? AND o.user_id=?ï¼‰ï¼Œç®€åŒ–äº†åŠ¨æ€æ¡ä»¶çš„æ‹¼æ¥é€»è¾‘ã€‚

//stayus 0:å¾…å¤„ç† 1:å¤„ç†ä¸­ 2:å®Œæˆ

//è·å–å®šå•åˆ—è¡¨
exports.getOrders = async (req, res) => {
  const { status } = req.query;
  try {
    let sql = `SELECT o.*,
    s.name AS server_name,
    m.name AS merchant_name
    FROM orders AS o
    LEFT JOIN services AS s ON o.service_id = s.id 
    LEFT JOIN merchants AS m ON s.merchant_id = m.id
    WHERE 1=1`;
    let params = [];

    if (status !== undefined) {
      sql += ` AND o.status=?`;
      params.push(status);
    }
    //åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºæ ¼
    sql += ` ORDER BY o.create_time DESC`;

    const [row] = await pool.execute(sql, params);
    res.json({
      code: 200,
      message: "è·å–æˆåŠŸ",
      data: row,
    });
  } catch (err) {
    res.json({
      code: 500,
      message: "è·å–å¤±è´¥",
      error: err.message,
    });
  }
};

import axios from "axios";

export const serviceAPI = {
  getServices: (category = "") => {
    const params = {
      ...(category ? { category } : {}),
      t: Date.now(),
    };
    return axios.get("/api/service/list", { params });
  },
  addService: (data) => {
    return axios.post("/api/service/add", data);
  },
  publishService: (id) => {
    axios.put(`/api/service/publish/${id}`);
  },
  unpublishService: (id) => {
    axios.put(`/api/service/unpublish/${id}`);
  },
};

export default serviceAPI;

<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from "vue";
import merchantAPI from "../../api/merchant";

export default {
  name: "MerchantView",
  setup() {
    // å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®
    const merchants = ref([]);
    // æ–°å¢å•†å®¶è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
    const newMerchant = ref({
      name: "",
      address: "",
      phone: "",
    });
    // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆåˆ—è¡¨åŠ è½½ä¸­ï¼‰
    const isLoading = ref(false);
    // æäº¤çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ–°å¢å•†å®¶æ—¶ï¼‰
    const isSubmitting = ref(false);
    // å®¡æ ¸çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆé’ˆå¯¹æ¯ä¸ªå•†å®¶çš„å•ç‹¬åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤ç‚¹å‡»ï¼‰
    const isApproving = ref({}); // ç»“æ„ï¼š{ 1: true, 2: false, ... }

    // è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆå°è£…ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¾¿äºå¤ç”¨ï¼‰
    const getMerchants = async () => {
      try {
        isLoading.value = true; // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
        const response = await merchantAPI.getMerchantList();
        merchants.value = response.data.data || []; // å…¼å®¹ç©ºæ•°æ®
      } catch (error) {
        alert("è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼š" + (error.message || "ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯"));
        console.error("å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼š", error);
      } finally {
        isLoading.value = false; // æ— è®ºæˆåŠŸå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå…³é—­åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
      }
    };

    // æ–°å¢å•†å®¶
    const addMerchant = async () => {
      // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯
      if (!newMerchant.value.name.trim()) {
        alert("è¯·è¾“å…¥å•†å®¶åç§°ï¼");
        return;
      }
      if (!newMerchant.value.address.trim()) {
        alert("è¯·è¾“å…¥å•†å®¶åœ°å€ï¼");
        return;
      }
      if (!newMerchant.value.phone.trim()) {
        alert("è¯·è¾“å…¥è”ç³»ç”µè¯ï¼");
        return;
      }
      // ç®€å•æ‰‹æœºå·æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯ï¼ˆ11ä½æ•°å­—ï¼‰
      if (!/^\d{11}$/.test(newMerchant.value.phone)) {
        alert("è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„11ä½æ‰‹æœºå·ï¼");
        return;
      }

      try {
        isSubmitting.value = true; // é˜²æ­¢é‡å¤æäº¤
        await merchantAPI.addMerchant(newMerchant.value);
        alert("å•†å®¶æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸï¼");

        // æ¸…ç©ºè¡¨å•
        newMerchant.value = { name: "", address: "", phone: "" };

        // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
        getMerchants();
      } catch (error) {
        alert("æ·»åŠ å•†å®¶å¤±è´¥ï¼š" + (error.message || "æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯"));
        console.error("æ–°å¢å•†å®¶å¤±è´¥ï¼š", error);
      } finally {
        isSubmitting.value = false; // æ¢å¤æäº¤çŠ¶æ€
      }
    };

    // å®¡æ ¸å•†å®¶ï¼ˆæ ¸å¿ƒè¡¥å……ï¼‰
    const handleApprove = async (id) => {
      // ç¡®è®¤æ“ä½œï¼ˆé¿å…è¯¯ç‚¹ï¼‰
      if (!confirm("ç¡®å®šè¦é€šè¿‡è¯¥å•†å®¶çš„å®¡æ ¸å—ï¼Ÿ")) {
        return;
      }

      try {
        // æ ‡è®°å½“å‰å•†å®¶æ­£åœ¨å®¡æ ¸ä¸­
        isApproving.value[id] = true;

        await merchantAPI.approveMerchant(id);
        alert("å•†å®¶å®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡ï¼");

        // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
        getMerchants();
      } catch (error) {
        alert("å®¡æ ¸å¤±è´¥ï¼š" + (error.message || "æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯"));
        console.error(`å®¡æ ¸å•†å®¶${id}å¤±è´¥ï¼š`, error);
      } finally {
        // æ¸…é™¤å®¡æ ¸çŠ¶æ€
        isApproving.value[id] = false;
      }
    };

    // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆå…¼å®¹ç©ºå€¼ï¼‰
    const formatTime = (timeString) => {
      if (!timeString) return "-";
      return new Date(timeString).toLocaleString();
    };

    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½æ—¶åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®
    onMounted(() => {
      getMerchants();
    });

    return {
      merchants,
      newMerchant,
      isLoading,
      isSubmitting,
      isApproving,
      addMerchant,
      handleApprove, // å¯¼å‡ºå®¡æ ¸æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå…³é”®è¡¥å……ï¼‰
      formatTime,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<template>
  <div class="service-page">
    <h2>ğŸ›ï¸ æœåŠ¡ç®¡ç†</h2>

    <!-- æ–°å¢æœåŠ¡è¡¨å• -->
    <div class="add-form">
      <h3>â• æ–°å¢æœåŠ¡</h3>
      <div class="form-grid">
        <input v-model="newService.name" placeholder="æœåŠ¡åç§°" class="input" />
        <select v-model="newService.merchant_id" class="input">
          <option value="">é€‰æ‹©å•†å®¶</option>
          <option
            v-for="merchant in merchants"
            :key="merchant.id"
            :value="merchant.id"
          >
            {{ merchant.name }}
          </option>
        </select>
        <input
          v-model="newService.price"
          type="number"
          placeholder="ä»·æ ¼"
          class="input"
        />
        <select v-model="newService.category" class="input">
          <option value="">é€‰æ‹©åˆ†ç±»</option>
          <option value="å®¶æ”¿">å®¶æ”¿</option>
          <option value="ç»´ä¿®">ç»´ä¿®</option>
          <option value="ä¿æ´">ä¿æ´</option>
        </select>
        <input
          v-model="newService.stock"
          type="number"
          placeholder="åº“å­˜"
          class="input"
        />
        <input
          v-model="newService.image_url"
          placeholder="å›¾ç‰‡URL"
          class="input"
        />
        <button @click="addService" class="btn btn-primary">æ·»åŠ æœåŠ¡</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨ -->
    <div class="service-list">
      <h3>ğŸ“‹ æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨</h3>
      <table class="table">
        <thead>
          <tr>
            <th>ID</th>
            <th>æœåŠ¡åç§°</th>
            <th>å•†å®¶</th>
            <th>ä»·æ ¼</th>
            <th>åˆ†ç±»</th>
            <th>åº“å­˜</th>
            <th>çŠ¶æ€</th>
            <th>æ“ä½œ</th>
            <!-- æ–°å¢æ“ä½œåˆ— -->
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          <tr v-for="service in services" :key="service.id">
            <td>{{ service.id }}</td>
            <td>{{ service.name }}</td>
            <td>{{ service.merchant_name }}</td>
            <td>Â¥{{ service.price }}</td>

            <td>{{ service.stock }}</td>
            <td>
              <span :class="service.status === 0 ? 'status-off' : 'status-on'">
                {{ service.status === 0 ? "ä¸‹æ¶" : "ä¸Šæ¶" }}
              </span>

              <!-- ä¸Šæ¶æŒ‰é’®ï¼ˆä¸‹æ¶çŠ¶æ€æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼‰ -->
              <button
                v-if="service.status === 0"
                class="btn btn-publish"
                @click="handlePublish(service.id)"
              >
                ä¸Šæ¶

              <button
                v-else

              >
                ä¸‹æ¶
              </button>

</template>

<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from "vue";
import serviceAPI from "../../api/service";
import merchantAPI from "../../api/merchant";

export default {
  name: "ServiceView",
  setup() {
    const services = ref([]);
    const merchants = ref([]);
    const newService = ref({
      name: "",
      merchant_id: "",
      price: "",
      category: "",
      stock: "",
      image_url: "",
    });

    // è·å–æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨
    const getServices = async () => {
      try {
        const response = await serviceAPI.getServices();
        services.value = response.data.data;
      } catch (error) {
        alert("è·å–æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    // è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨
    const getMerchants = async () => {
      try {
        const response = await merchantAPI.getMerchantList();
        merchants.value = response.data.data;
      } catch (error) {
        alert("è·å–å•†å®¶åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    // æ–°å¢æœåŠ¡
    const addService = async () => {
      if (
        !newService.value.name ||
        !newService.value.merchant_id ||
        !newService.value.price
      ) {
        alert("è¯·å¡«å†™å®Œæ•´ä¿¡æ¯ï¼");
        return;
      }

      try {
        await serviceAPI.addService(newService.value);
        alert("æœåŠ¡æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸï¼");
        newService.value = {
          name: "",
          merchant_id: "",
          price: "",
          category: "",
          stock: "",
          image_url: "",
        };
        getServices();
      } catch (error) {
        alert("æ·»åŠ æœåŠ¡å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    // ä¸Šæ¶æœåŠ¡ï¼ˆçŠ¶æ€æ›´æ–°ä¸º1ï¼‰
    const handlePublish = async (id) => {
      try {
        await serviceAPI.publishService(id);
        alert("æœåŠ¡ä¸Šæ¶æˆåŠŸï¼");
        getServices(); // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
      } catch (error) {
        alert("ä¸Šæ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    // ä¸‹æ¶æœåŠ¡ï¼ˆçŠ¶æ€æ›´æ–°ä¸º0ï¼‰
    const handleUnpublish = async (id) => {
      try {
        await serviceAPI.unpublishService(id);
        alert("æœåŠ¡ä¸‹æ¶æˆåŠŸï¼");
        getServices(); // åˆ·æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
      } catch (error) {
        alert("ä¸‹æ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    onMounted(() => {
      getServices();
      getMerchants();
    });

    return {
      services,
      merchants,
      newService,
      addService,
      handlePublish, // å¯¼å‡ºä¸Šæ¶æ–¹æ³•
      handleUnpublish, // å¯¼å‡ºä¸‹æ¶æ–¹æ³•
    };
  },
};
</script>

    <div class="filter-section">

      <div class="filter-group">
        <label>
          <input type="radio" v-model="filterStatus" value="" /> å…¨éƒ¨è®¢å•
        </label>
        <label>
          <input type="radio" v-model="filterStatus" value="0" /> å¾…æ”¯ä»˜
        </label>
        <label>
          <input type="radio" v-model="filterStatus" value="1" /> å·²å®Œæˆ
        </label>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨ -->
    <div class="order-list">
      <h3>è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨</h3>
      <table class="table">
        <thead>
          <tr>
            <th>è®¢å•ID</th>
            <th>æœåŠ¡åç§°</th>
            <th>å•†å®¶</th>
            <th>ç”¨æˆ·å§“å</th>
            <th>ç”¨æˆ·ç”µè¯</th>
            <th>ä»·æ ¼</th>
            <th>çŠ¶æ€</th>
            <th>ä¸‹å•æ—¶é—´</th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          <tr v-for="order in orders" :key="order.id">
            <td>{{ order.id }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.service_name }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.merchant_name }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.user_name }}</td>
            <td>{{ order.user_phone }}</td>
            <td>Â¥{{ order.price }}</td>
            <td>
              <span
                :class="
                  order.status === 0 ? 'status-pending' : 'status-completed'
                "
              >
                {{ order.status === 0 ? "å¾…æ”¯ä»˜" : "å·²å®Œæˆ" }}

<script>
import { ref, onMounted, watch } from "vue";
import orderAPI from "../../api/order";

export default {
  name: "OrderView",
  setup() {
    const orders = ref([]);
    const filterStatus = ref("");

    // è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
    const getOrders = async (status = "") => {
      try {
        const response = await orderAPI.getOrders(status);
        orders.value = response.data.data;
      } catch (error) {
        alert("è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
    const formatTime = (timeString) => {
      return new Date(timeString).toLocaleString();
    };

    // ç›‘å¬ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶å˜åŒ–
    watch(filterStatus, (newStatus) => {
      getOrders(newStatus);
    });

    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½æ—¶è·å–æ•°æ®
    onMounted(() => {
      getOrders();
    });

    return {
      orders,
      filterStatus,
      formatTime,
    };
  },
};
</script>

const request = (url, method = "GET", data = {}) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    wx.request({
      url: "http://localhost:8080/api" + url,
      method,
      data,
      success: (res) => {
        if (res.data.code === 200) {
          resolve(res.data.data);
        } else {
          reject(res.data.msg);
        }
      },
      fail: (err) => {
        reject("ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ï¼š" + err.errMsg);
      },
    });
  });
};

module.exports = request;

.container {
  padding: 20rpx;
  background: #f5f5f5;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

/* å¤´éƒ¨æ ·å¼ */
.header {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 40rpx 0 60rpx;
}

.title {
  display: block;
  font-size: 48rpx;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 10rpx;
}

.subtitle {
  display: block;
  font-size: 28rpx;
  color: #7f8c8d;
}

/* åˆ†ç±»åŒºåŸŸ */
.category-section {
  margin-bottom: 40rpx;
}

.section-title {
  font-size: 36rpx;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 30rpx;
  display: block;
}

.category-grid {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-around;
  background: white;
  padding: 30rpx;
  border-radius: 20rpx;
  box-shadow: 0 4rpx 20rpx rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.category-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.category-icon {
  font-size: 60rpx;
  margin-bottom: 15rpx;
}

.category-name {
  font-size: 28rpx;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

/* æ¨èæœåŠ¡ */
.recommend-section {
  margin-bottom: 100rpx;
}

.section-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30rpx;
}

.more {
  font-size: 28rpx;
  color: #3498db;
}

.service-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 20rpx;
}

.service-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 20rpx;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4rpx 20rpx rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.service-image {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200rpx;
  background: #ecf0f1;
}

.service-info {
  padding: 20rpx;
}

.service-name {
  display: block;
  font-size: 30rpx;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 10rpx;
}

.service-merchant {
  display: block;

}

.service-bottom {

}

.service-price {

}

.service-category {

  padding: 5rpx 15rpx;
  border-radius: 20rpx;
}

/* åº•éƒ¨å¯¼èˆª */
.bottom-nav {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: white;

}

.nav-text {

const request = require("../../utils/request");

Page({
  data: {
    services: [],
    categories: ["å…¨éƒ¨", "å®¶æ”¿", "ç»´ä¿®", "ä¿æ´"],
    activeCategory: "å…¨éƒ¨",
    searchKeyword: "",
  },

  onLoad(options) {
    if (options.type) {
      this.setData({ activeCategory: options.type });
    }
    this.getServices();
  },

  // è·å–æœåŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨
  async getServices() {
    const { activeCategory, searchKeyword } = this.data;

    try {
      let category = activeCategory === "å…¨éƒ¨" ? "" : activeCategory;
      let services = await request("/service/list", "GET", { category });

      // å‰ç«¯æœç´¢è¿‡æ»¤
      if (searchKeyword) {
        services = services.filter(
          (service) =>
            service.name.includes(searchKeyword) ||
            service.merchant_name.includes(searchKeyword)
        );
      }

      this.setData({ services });
    } catch (err) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: "åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥",
        icon: "none",
      });
    }
  },

  // åˆ‡æ¢åˆ†ç±»
  switchCategory(e) {
    const category = e.currentTarget.dataset.category;
    this.setData({
      activeCategory: category,
      searchKeyword: "",
    });
    this.getServices();
  },

  // æœç´¢è¾“å…¥
  onSearchInput(e) {
    this.setData({ searchKeyword: e.detail.value });
  },

  // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
  onSearch() {
    this.getServices();
  },

  // è·³è½¬åˆ°ä¸‹å•é¡µé¢ï¼ˆä¿®æ”¹åï¼‰
  toOrderCreate(e) {
    const service = e.currentTarget.dataset.service;
    wx.navigateTo({
      url: `/pages/orderCreate/orderCreate?service=${encodeURIComponent(
        JSON.stringify(service)
      )}`,
    });
  },
});

const request = require("../../utils/request");

Page({
  data: {
    service: null,
    userInfo: {
      name: "",
      phone: "",
    },
  },

  onLoad(options) {
    if (options.service) {
      try {
        const serviceStr = decodeURIComponent(options.service);
        const service = JSON.parse(serviceStr);
        this.setData({ service });
      } catch (err) {
        // 3. æ•è·è§£æé”™è¯¯ï¼Œé¿å…é¡µé¢å´©æºƒå¹¶æç¤ºç”¨æˆ·
        console.error("æœåŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯è§£æå¤±è´¥ï¼š", err);
        wx.showToast({
          title: "æœåŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯é”™è¯¯",
          icon: "none",
          duration: 2000,
        });
        // è§£æå¤±è´¥æ—¶è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ
        setTimeout(() => {
          wx.navigateBack();
        }, 2000);
      }
    } else {
      // æ²¡æœ‰ä¼ é€’ service å‚æ•°æ—¶çš„æç¤º
      wx.showToast({
        title: "æœªè·å–åˆ°æœåŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯",
        icon: "none",
        duration: 2000,
      });
      setTimeout(() => {
        wx.navigateBack();
      }, 2000);
    }
  },

  // è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å§“å
  onNameInput(e) {
    this.setData({
      "userInfo.name": e.detail.value,
    });
  },

  // è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·ç”µè¯
  onPhoneInput(e) {
    this.setData({
      "userInfo.phone": e.detail.value,
    });
  },

  // æäº¤è®¢å•
  async submitOrder() {
    const { service, userInfo } = this.data;

    if (!userInfo.name.trim()) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: "è¯·è¾“å…¥å§“å",
        icon: "none",
      });
      return;
    }

    if (!userInfo.phone.trim()) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: "è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‰‹æœºå·",
        icon: "none",
      });
      return;
    }

    // ç®€å•çš„æ‰‹æœºå·éªŒè¯
    const phoneRegex = /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/;
    if (!phoneRegex.test(userInfo.phone)) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: "è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·",
        icon: "none",
      });
      return;
    }

    try {
      wx.showLoading({
        title: "æäº¤ä¸­...",
      });

      await request("/order/create", "POST", {
        service_id: service.id,
        user_name: userInfo.name,
        user_phone: userInfo.phone,
      });

      wx.hideLoading();

      wx.showToast({
        title: "è®¢å•åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸï¼",
        icon: "success",
        duration: 2000,
      });

      // è·³è½¬åˆ°è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
      setTimeout(() => {
        wx.navigateTo({
          url: "/pages/orderList/orderList",
        });
      }, 2000);
    } catch (err) {
      wx.hideLoading();
      wx.showToast({
        title: "è®¢å•åˆ›å»ºå¤±è´¥",
        icon: "none",
      });
    }
  },
});

const request = require("../../utils/request");

Page({
  data: {
    orders: [],
  },

  onLoad() {
    this.getOrders();
  },

  onShow() {
    this.getOrders();
  },

  // è·å–è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
  async getOrders() {
    try {
      const orders = await request("/order/list");
      this.setData({ orders });
    } catch (err) {
      wx.showToast({
        title: "åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥",
        icon: "none",
      });
    }
  },

  // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
  formatTime(timeString) {
    const date = new Date(timeString);
    return `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1)
      .toString()
      .padStart(2, "0")}-${date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, "0")} ${date
      .getHours()
      .toString()
      .padStart(2, "0")}:${date.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, "0")}`;
  },
});
